channel.title: Request Staff help

item.title: Request Staff help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You need to either be able to correctly communicate your problems or listen to others advice before you respond with sarcasm.

kronixz:

No shit, it’s saying that at the top of my file import.playerhander is not there. but it is…

If you imported your PlayerHandler class why the fuck are directly stating the classes path within your ClickingButtons? Quit being disrespectful to those who are helping you. If you imported it, why on Earth are you directly stating the classes path each and every time? That’s stupid and unnecessary. So, either you need to work on your imports or remove that unnecessary garbage.

Also, while you’re reading up on imports read up on Java case sensitivity.

The fuck are you doing with this:

Server.playerHandler

Either fix your conventions, your “import” (lolololol) or fix your packaging.

Read full topic

item.title: Request Staff help
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Ok so im adding this into my clicking buttons.

case 62166: //Help Request if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.helpTimer < 60000) { c.sendMessage("You can only request help once a minute."); } else { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (PlayerHandler.players[j].playerRights > 0 && PlayerHandler.players[j].playerRights < 4 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.helpTimer > 60000) { c2.sendMessage("@red@[HELP REQUEST]@blu@ - "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+" needs help. Coordinates are: @red@"+c.absX+"@blu@, @red@"+c.absY+"."); c.sendMessage("You're help request has been sent to online staff. We hope to help you shortly."); c.helpTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } } }

and when i compiled, i got this

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:56: error: package Server.
playerHandler does not exist
for (int j = 0; j < Serv
er.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {

            ^

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:57: error: package Server
does not exist
if (Server.playe
rHandler.players[j] != null) {
^

does not exist
Client c
2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

              ^

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:62: error: possible loss o
f precision

c.helpTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();

                                  ^

required: int
found: long

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
